short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor all Segment activity on any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Segment Inspector is the one-stop shop for inspecting Segment analytics integration with an app or website. From monitoring events, to exploring user's traits and all the way to checking active plugins and integrations.
